nodes.text: An ufflor officer was a high-ranking member of an Ugnaught tribe elected by the members of the tribe to represent their people in the Parliament of Guilds on Cloud City.[source?] Ugnor was appointed Ufflor of Ufflors to speak as a single voice for the Irden, Botrut, and Isced tribes. Working with Baron Ecclessis Figg, Ugnor and the ufflors started the Ugnaught Mechanics Union.
